title: Garshasp: The Monster Slayer

notes: Game wont start, but i did managed to make the config-window to work. You have to download or Copy the File "PhysXLoader.dll" (If you have other Games installed, i would recommend that you search in your Steam-Folder for it, and drop it in your "Garshasp"-Gamefolder  "[PATH TO YOUR GAMEFOLDER]/distro". So you can play around with the settings... Maybe this will help anyone.
